name: Glmnat
tagline: Natural coordinate descent algorithm for L1-penalised regression in generalised linear models
body: ### Welcome to Glmnat Glmnat is Matlab toolbox for L1-penalised regression in generalised linear models, using the natural coordinate descent algorithm introduced in [this preprint](http://arxiv.org/abs/1405.4225). Currently Glmnat is only available for penalised logistic regression, more models will be added in the future. ### Reference Please cite: Michoel T. Natural coordinate descent algorithm for L1-penalised regression in generalised linear models. [arXiv:1405.4225](http://arxiv.org/abs/1405.4225). ### Contact Contact [Tom Michoel](https://github.com/tm00) for more details.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
